#summary Base class

= Syntax =

{{{
var chart = new MilkChart.Class(table, [options])
}}}

= Arguments =

 1. table - (mixed) a table Element (or its id) that should be transformed
 1. options - (object, optional) a key/value set of options

= Options =

 * key - (int) value

= Classes =

 * [Column]
 * [Bar]
 * [Line]
 * [Scatter]
 * [Pie]
